title: Spotify Wrapped 2021 Shows Bad Bunny, Taylor Swift, BTS as Most-Streamed Artists Globally
sub_head: Puerto Rican musician tops platform for back-to-back years
body:
Puerto Rican musician Bad Bunny was Spotify’s most listened-to artist in 2021 despite not releasing a new album, data from the audiostreaming giant shows.
Spotify Technology SA on Tuesday released its 2021 Wrapped, an annual list highlighting how its roughly 381 million monthly active users and 172 million paying subscribers around the world used the app. Spotify’s Wrapped also tells individual users how many minutes they spent listening to music and what they listened to most—lists many users posted to social media.
